about.title: [PT] About Fruit Habibi
about.subtitle: [PT] Connecting the world's finest growers with trusted buyers across borders, building a sustainable future for global agricultural trade.
about.ourStoryDesc1: [PT] Founded with a vision to revolutionize the global fruits and vegetables trade, Fruit Habibi emerged from the understanding that quality produce deserves quality connections.
about.ourStoryDesc2: [PT] We bridge the gap between passionate growers who cultivate the earth's finest harvest and discerning buyers who value excellence, sustainability, and authentic partnerships.
about.ourStoryDesc3: [PT] Today, we're proud to facilitate thousands of successful trades, supporting agricultural communities while delivering exceptional produce worldwide.
about.ourMissionDesc: [PT] To create a transparent, efficient, and sustainable marketplace that empowers agricultural producers and connects them with buyers who appreciate quality.
about.qualityFirstDesc: [PT] We believe exceptional produce deserves exceptional service.
about.trustTransparencyDesc: [PT] Building relationships through honest communication and reliable service.
about.globalCommunityDesc: [PT] Celebrating diversity while fostering international collaboration.
about.whatWeOfferDesc: [PT] Comprehensive solutions for the modern agricultural marketplace
about.logisticsExcellenceDesc: [PT] Seamless shipping solutions ensuring your produce reaches its destination fresh and on time.
about.directCommunicationDesc: [PT] Connect directly with verified suppliers and buyers through our secure messaging platform.
about.trustedNetworkDesc: [PT] Join a curated community of verified exporters and buyers committed to quality and reliability.
about.readyToJoinDesc: [PT] Whether you're a grower looking to expand your reach or a buyer seeking quality produce, we're here to help you succeed.

terms.title: [PT] Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: [PT] Please read these terms carefully before using our B2B marketplace platform. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.welcomeDesc: [PT] These Terms of Service govern your use of our premium B2B marketplace platform that connects fruit and vegetable growers with buyers worldwide. We're committed to providing a secure, transparent, and efficient trading environment for all our users.
terms.questionsDesc: [PT] If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact our legal team. We're here to help clarify any concerns you may have.
terms.section1Content:
[PT] By accessing and using Fruit Habibi ("the Platform"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our B2B marketplace platform that connects premium fruit and vegetable growers with trusted buyers worldwide. By creating an account or using our services, you agree to these terms.
terms.section2Content:
[PT] Fruit Habibi provides a digital marketplace platform that enables:

‚Ä¢ Product listing and discovery services
‚Ä¢ Secure payment processing with escrow protection
‚Ä¢ Communication tools between buyers and sellers
‚Ä¢ Quality verification and dispute resolution
‚Ä¢ International shipping coordination
‚Ä¢ Business verification and trust scoring

We act as an intermediary platform and do not directly sell or purchase products listed by users.
terms.section3Content:
[PT] To use our platform, you must:

‚Ä¢ Provide accurate and complete business information
‚Ä¢ Maintain the security of your account credentials
‚Ä¢ Complete business verification process
‚Ä¢ Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in fraudulent activities. Business verification is required for all sellers and recommended for buyers.

You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account and must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.
terms.section4Content:
[PT] Users are strictly prohibited from:

‚Ä¢ Listing counterfeit, illegal, or prohibited products
‚Ä¢ Providing false or misleading product information
‚Ä¢ Attempting to circumvent our payment system
‚Ä¢ Engaging in fraudulent transactions
‚Ä¢ Violating intellectual property rights
‚Ä¢ Harassment or abuse of other users
‚Ä¢ Manipulating reviews or ratings
‚Ä¢ Using automated systems to access the platform
‚Ä¢ Selling products outside of permitted categories

Violations may result in immediate account suspension and legal action.
terms.section5Content:
[PT] Payment Terms:

‚Ä¢ All transactions are processed through our secure escrow system
‚Ä¢ Platform fee: 3% of transaction value (2.5% for verified premium sellers)
‚Ä¢ Payment processing fees may apply
‚Ä¢ Refunds are subject to our dispute resolution process

Buyers pay upfront, and sellers receive payment after successful delivery confirmation. We hold funds in escrow to protect both parties during the transaction.

All fees are clearly displayed before transaction completion. Currency conversion rates apply for international transactions.
terms.section6Content:
[PT] Dispute Process:

1. Direct Communication: Users must attempt to resolve issues directly first
2. Platform Mediation: Our team will mediate if direct resolution fails
3. Evidence Review: Both parties must provide relevant documentation
4. Resolution Timeline: Standard disputes resolved within 7 business days
5. Appeal Process: Users can appeal decisions within 48 hours

We reserve the right to:
‚Ä¢ Issue full or partial refunds
‚Ä¢ Suspend accounts during investigation
‚Ä¢ Adjust trust scores based on dispute outcomes
‚Ä¢ Escalate to legal authorities for serious violations

Our decision is binding unless overturned through the appeal process.
terms.section7Content:
[PT] Intellectual Property Rights:

‚Ä¢ Users retain ownership of their product listings and content
‚Ä¢ Users grant us license to display and promote their content on the platform
‚Ä¢ We own all platform technology, design, and proprietary systems
‚Ä¢ Trademark infringement is strictly prohibited
‚Ä¢ Users must have rights to all images and content they upload

We respect intellectual property rights and will remove infringing content upon notification. Users who repeatedly infringe on IP rights may have their accounts terminated.
terms.section8Content:
[PT] Data Protection:

‚Ä¢ We collect and process data as described in our Privacy Policy
‚Ä¢ User data is protected with industry-standard security measures
‚Ä¢ We may share data with trusted partners for service delivery
‚Ä¢ Users can request data deletion subject to legal requirements
‚Ä¢ International data transfers comply with applicable regulations

By using our platform, you consent to our data collection and processing practices. We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining data security.
terms.section9Content:
[PT] Liability Limitations:

‚Ä¢ Our platform is provided "as is" without warranties
‚Ä¢ We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
‚Ä¢ Our total liability is limited to fees paid to us in the preceding 12 months
‚Ä¢ We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service
‚Ä¢ Users are responsible for their own business decisions

We act as an intermediary platform and are not responsible for:
‚Ä¢ Product quality or condition
‚Ä¢ Delivery delays or issues
‚Ä¢ Business disputes between users
‚Ä¢ Third-party service failures

Users participate at their own risk and should conduct due diligence.
terms.section10Content:
[PT] Account Termination:

We may suspend or terminate accounts for:
‚Ä¢ Violation of these Terms of Service
‚Ä¢ Fraudulent or illegal activities
‚Ä¢ Non-payment of fees
‚Ä¢ Misrepresentation of business information
‚Ä¢ Harassment of other users

Users may terminate their accounts at any time by contacting support. Upon termination:
‚Ä¢ Active transactions must be completed
‚Ä¢ Outstanding fees must be paid
‚Ä¢ Account data may be retained for legal compliance
‚Ä¢ User content may be removed from public view
terms.section11Content:
[PT] Global Trade Requirements:

‚Ä¢ Users must comply with all applicable international trade laws
‚Ä¢ Export/import regulations must be followed
‚Ä¢ Sanctions and embargo restrictions apply
‚Ä¢ Customs documentation is user responsibility
‚Ä¢ We may restrict transactions based on compliance requirements

Users are responsible for:
‚Ä¢ Obtaining necessary permits and licenses
‚Ä¢ Complying with destination country regulations
‚Ä¢ Accurate customs declarations
‚Ä¢ Payment of applicable duties and taxes

We reserve the right to block transactions that may violate trade laws.
terms.section12Content:
[PT] Modifications:

‚Ä¢ We may update these Terms of Service from time to time
‚Ä¢ Users will be notified of significant changes via email
‚Ä¢ Continued use constitutes acceptance of new terms
‚Ä¢ Users may terminate accounts if they disagree with changes
‚Ä¢ Previous versions are available upon request

Changes may be made to:
‚Ä¢ Reflect new services or features
‚Ä¢ Comply with legal requirements
‚Ä¢ Improve user experience
‚Ä¢ Address security concerns

We encourage users to review terms periodically.
